title: Five minute chocolate breakfast muffins
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons wholemeal plain flour', '4 tablespoons demerara sugar', '2 tablespoons cocoa powder', '1/3 teaspoon baking powder', '2 teaspoons chocolate chips (optional but awesome!)', '2 tablespoons whisked egg', '3 tablespoons milk', '3 tablespoons sunflower oil', '1 splash vanilla extract']
